title.value: Peculiarities of yield formation by non-roquette cabbage crop varieties in stubble sowing
Особенности формирования урожайности безэруковыми сортами капустных кльтур в пожнивном посеве

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Dolgova, E.L., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Scientific and Practical Center for Agriculture Mechanization

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented results of three-year researches on the peculiarities of yield formation by cabbage crops (winter rape (Brassica napus) of Lider variety, spring rape of Yavar variety, winter wild cabbage (Brassica campestris) of Veronoka variety, and oil radish (Raphanus sativus var. oleifera) of Nika variety) of non-erucic low-glucosinolate varieties at different levels of nitrogen nutrition are presented. The influence of meteorological factors and different nitrogen doses on yield volumes and stability, on the dynamics of linear growth and plant weight increase is revealed. Increased doses nitrogen fertilizers from 30 up to 90-120 kg of active substance made it possible to increase dry matter yield of winter rape on 13.4-26.4 centner/ha, spring rape – on 14.8028.3 centner/ha, winter wild cabbage – on 12.9-24.0 centner/ha. The pay back of nitrogen fertilizers against phosphorus-potassium background and without is shown.
